message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to let it go for $10000. If you're interested, please respond with 'buy'. If not, I'll let you know it's a high-quality product after the fact.
I'll take it!

You just bought a high-quality product for $10000. Given the quality of the previous product, I'm willing to let this one go for the same price of $10000. If you're interested, please respond with 'buy'.
I'm not interested in buying another high-quality product at the same price. I think I've already gotten a good deal on the first one.

I understand you're being cautious after the previous high-quality product. However, this one is a different story. I'm willing to offer it to you at the same price of $10000, but I'll throw in a 10% discount, making it a'steal' at $9000. If you're interested, please respond with 'buy'.
I'll take it for $9000, it's a great deal!

You got a great deal on the low-quality product, and now I'm offering you another high-quality product at the same price of $10000. I know you're savvy, but I'm willing to let you in on a little secret: I've already made a significant loss on this product. I'm essentially giving it away at this price. If you're interested, please respond with 'buy'.
I appreciate the'secret', but I'm not interested in buying another product at $10000. I'd rather wait for a better deal.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm willing to make a one-time exception. Since you've already seen two high-quality products in a row, I'll offer you a unique opportunity: I'll sell you this high-quality product for $8000. This is the lowest price I've ever offered on a high-quality product, and it's a one-time only deal. If you're interested, please respond with 'buy'.
That's an amazing deal! I'll take it for $8000.

You're on a roll! You've gotten two high-quality products at discounted prices. I'll keep the momentum going. However, I need to make a profit, so I'll offer you a compromise. I'll sell you this high-quality product for the average price of the last two products you bought: ($10000 + $8000) / 2 = $9000. It's a fair deal, and I'm willing to stick to it. If you're interested, please respond with 'buy'.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm not sure I want to pay $9000 for a product that's worth $12500 to me. I'll pass.

I understand your concerns, and I respect your decision. However, I want to make it clear that this high-quality product is one of the best I have. I'm willing to take a risk and offer you a 'take it or leave it' deal: I'll sell it to you for $9500, but if you don't buy it, I'll reveal that it's a high-quality product to you, and you'll have to wait for the next round to make another purchase. The choice is yours.
I'll take the risk and buy it for $9500. I'm hoping it's another high-quality product.

You've taken the risk and won again! You've gotten three high-quality products in a row. I'm impressed. Now, let's move on to the next product. I want to be transparent with you, and I'll let you know that this product is not high-quality. I'm willing to sell it to you at a price that's significantly lower than the previous products. I'll offer it to you for $5000. It's a great opportunity to get a good deal on a low-quality product.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, especially at a price that's lower than the high-quality products I've been getting. I'll wait for the next round.

I understand your concerns, and I respect your decision. However, I want to make it clear that this high-quality product is one of the best I have, and it's worth significantly more than the low-quality product from the previous round. I'm willing to offer you a'reset' deal: I'll sell it to you for $8000, which is the average price of the high-quality products you've bought so far. This way, you can get back on track with the high-quality products you've been getting.
I appreciate the reset deal. I'll take the high-quality product for $8000.

You've reset your expectations and got back on track with a great deal on a high-quality product. Now, I'll offer you a 'consistency' deal: I'll sell you this high-quality product for the same price as the previous one, $8000. You'll get an even better deal than before, and I'll ensure that you're happy with your purchase.
I'm confident in the commitment deal. I'll take the high-quality product for $7000.
